title: Code Scraping
description: The bot regularly scans a designated website for the latest Genshin Impact codes and stores them with descriptions.

title: Real-time Alerts
description: Notifies your Discord server whenever new codes are found.

title: Embed Messages
description: Displays codes in a beautifully formatted Discord embed message to provide a clean and readable experience.

title: Discord Commands
description: Supports custom Discord commands to force search, display all active codes, and configure server parameters.
